title: Green Transformation of Biomass-Derived Indian Gooseberry into Fluorescent Intrinsic Nitrogen-Functionalized Carbon Quantum Dots for Real-Time Detection of Vitamin B2 in Nanomolar Range

Riboflavin (RF) detection is essential for controlling nutritional health due to its increasing significance in the food products and pharmaceutical industries. Regular daily intake of RF (vitamin B2) is important...
